actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: A bill making supplemental appropriations to carry out the lead-based paint poisoning prevention program for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1975.

summary.text: Appropriates $17,490,000 for fiscal year 1975 for grants for the detection and treatment of lead-based paint poisoning and $5,010,000 for the demonstration and research program under the Lead-Based Paint Poisoning Prevention Act.

titles.title: A bill making supplemental appropriations to carry out the lead-based paint poisoning prevention program for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1975.
